name: CVE-2022-26471
description: In telephony, there is a possible escalation of privilege due to a parcel format mismatch. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS07319121; Issue ID: ALPS07319121.
